SYLVESTER SALON FAMILY





MEET OUR TEAM

With an incredible team of talented stylists, nail technicians and artists, Sylvester Salon offers professional beauty services including haircuts, colors, highlights, balayage, corrective color, keratin treatments, styles, extensions, makeup, gel manicures, pedicures, waxing, weddings, and more. The services provided by the Gallery family are backed by continuing education and a passion for the craft. Our staff will give you the salon experience you deserve.

HAIR, NAILS, MAKEUP & MORE!

Sylvester Salon offers professional beauty services including women's haircuts, men's haircuts, children's haircuts, color, highlights, balayage, fashion colors, corrective color, blowouts, keratin treatments, updos, hair extensions, makeup, gel manicures, pedicures, waxing, weddings, and more.
